text: xô brrdā p̄hū̂ ṣ̄rạthṭhā xěy cng k̄hx lukæ̀thos̄ʹ dæ̀ xạllxḥˌ d̂wy kār lukæ̀thos̄ʹ xỳāng cringcạng t̄heid bāngthī phracêā k̄hxng phwk cêā ca lbl̂āng khwām p̄hid k̄hxng phwk cêā xxk cāk phwk cêā læa ca thrng h̄ı̂ phwk cêā k̄hêā s̄wn s̄wrrkh̒ h̄lākh̄lāy ṇ beụ̄̂xng l̀āng s̄wn s̄wrrkh̒ nận mī lản̂ả h̄lāy s̄āy h̄ịl p̄h̀ān wạn thī̀ xạllxḥˌ ca mị̀ thrng thả h̄ı̂ na bī læa brrdā p̄hū̂ ṣ̄rạthṭhā r̀wm kạb k̄heā t̂xng xạpyṣ̄ s̄ængs̄ẁāng k̄hxng phwk k̄heā ca s̄̀xng ĉā pị beụ̄̂xngh̄n̂ā k̄hxng phwk k̄heā læa thāng beụ̄̂xng k̄hwā k̄hxng phwk k̄heā phwk k̄heā ca kl̀āw ẁā k̄ĥā tæ̀ phracêā k̄hxng reā k̄hx phraxngkh̒ dị̂ thrng pord thảh̄ı̂ s̄ængs̄ẁāng k̄hxng reā xyū̀ kạb reā tlxd pị læa thrng yk thos̄ʹ h̄ı̂ kæ̀ reā thæ̂cring phraxngkh̒ th̀ān pĕn p̄hū̂thrng xānup̣hāph h̄enụ̄x thuk s̄ìng
